intro: Hieraciodes tenuifolia, commonly known as slenderleaf hieraciodes, is a flowering plant belonging to the Asteraceae family. It is characterized by its narrow, linear leaves and small, daisy-like yellow flowers. Native to specific regions of South America, it thrives in moist, shaded environments. The plant has a compact growth habit and is often found in woodland or rocky habitats. Its botanical features make it an interesting subject for ecological studies and horticultural cultivation.
